<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/chat-gateway/v1/channels"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves all customer Chat API channels based on the provided access token information.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>
